授業目的: Understanding the Science of Mind, Setting & Achieving Goals, Building New Habits To Create A Life of Happiness & Success While Improving English Skills
到達目標:
In this course, students will understand how the human mind works through the latest findings from psychology, neuroscience and cognitive science through lectures from some of the best university professors in the world. They will also learn the common blocks that prevent them from taking action towards their goals, learn about the most effective tools to change their behaviors by setting clear goals, motivating themselves to achieve their goals and overcoming the mental resistance to take action towards their goals. They will also practice using these tools to start creating themselves a healthier, happier and more successful future by reflecting on their current beliefs and start changing them.

Main areas to be covered will be:
Understanding the Mind Through Science
How to Set Clear Goals
How to Break Habits
How to Form New Habits
How to Execute & Take Action
Tools to Help Stay Consistent
授業方法:
Classes are planned to be face-to-face, but if the classes go online, sessions will be through Zoom & assignments will be submitted to LUNA.
Classes may be taught face-to-face from Tuesday, October 12, 2021.
